import{getAddress}from'@ethersproject/address';import{AddressZero}from'@ethersproject/constants';import{Contract}from'@ethersproject/contracts';// returns the checksummed address if the address is valid, otherwise returns false
export function isAddress(value){try{return getAddress(value);}catch(_unused){return false;}}// shorten the checksummed version of the input address to have 0x + 4 characters at start and end
export function shortenAddress(address){var chars=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:4;var parsed=isAddress(address);if(!parsed){throw Error("Invalid 'address' parameter '".concat(address,"'."));}return"".concat(parsed.substring(0,chars+2),"...").concat(parsed.substring(42-chars));}// account is not optional
function getSigner(library,account){return library.getSigner(account).connectUnchecked();}// account is optional
function getProviderOrSigner(library,account){return account?getSigner(library,account):library;}// account is optional
export function getContract(address,ABI,library,account){if(!isAddress(address)||address===AddressZero){throw Error("Invalid 'address' parameter '".concat(address,"'."));}return new Contract(address,ABI,getProviderOrSigner(library,account));}export function escapeRegExp(string){return string.replace(/[.*+?^${}()|[\]\\]/g,'\\$&');// $& means the whole matched string
}export function isTokenOnList(tokenAddressMap,token){var _tokenAddressMap$toke;return Boolean((token===null||token===void 0?void 0:token.isToken)&&((_tokenAddressMap$toke=tokenAddressMap[token.chainId])===null||_tokenAddressMap$toke===void 0?void 0:_tokenAddressMap$toke[token.address]));}export function formattedFeeAmount(feeAmount){return feeAmount/10000;}
